title: Floyd Wayne Kelly - Chattanoogan.com
text:
Floyd Wayne Kelly, 82, of Rossville, Georgia, passed away on Tuesday, February 18, 2025, in a local health care facility.
A longtime resident of Chattanooga and North Georgia, Mr. Kelly was a member of First Baptist Church of Fort Oglethorpe.
He was formerly employed with Conley Smith Chevrolet in Ft. Payne, Al., and retired from Shaw Industries after many years of service.
He was preceded in death by his sister, Patsy King and step-son, Donnie Holbrook.
Mr. Kelley is survived by his wife, Pauline Kelly; two step-sons, Steve (Patricia) Holbrook, Ackworth, Ga., and Greg (Linda) Holbrook, Rossville; sister, Jane Wingfield, East Ridge; three grandchildren, Lauren (Michael) Morgan, Apison, Adriana Holbrook and Isabella Holbrook, both of Atlanta; great-grandson, Maddox Morgan; nieces, Donna Tollison, Jeana (Chris) McNabb, Julie (Louie) Hall; nephews, Gary (Stacy) King, Randy Wingfield (Robin Hicks), and Chris (Juanita) Wingfield.
Graveside services will be held on Monday, Feb. 24, at noon at Hamilton Memorial Gardens, with Dr. Ernest Gross officiating. Pallbearers will be James Walls, Chris Wingfield, Gary King, Maddox Morgan, Michael Morgan, and Steve Holbrook.
You may share condolences with the family at www.heritagechattanooga.com
There will be no visitation held.
Arrangements are by Heritage Funeral Home, 7454 E. Brainerd Road.
